Message:
Skuld left the village
and a few years passed.

In that time, both my mother
and grandmother passed away,
and I was left with Rean
and Priscilla.

When the flames of war
make their way here...

how am I supposed to
protect these two?

I was reminded of that
big warm hand on my head.

I went and knocked
on the doors to the
Officers Academy.

This was the only way
I could think of to
protect them.

Having finished training,
I was assigned to the troop
that was under the direct
command of an aristocrat.

It seemed the life of
a soldier suited me.
